amendatorysection.catchline: First Regiment Nebraska Volunteer Infantry at Fort Donelson Committee; purpose; funding.
amendatorysection.para: The purpose of the First Regiment Nebraska Volunteer Infantry at Fort Donelson Committee shall be funded by gifts, grants, bequests, donations, and other privately donated funds and administered by a private foundation. No general funds of the state shall be expended for the purpose of sections 82-801 to 82-804.
